posts.postText:
NNJG should start up groups for potato-getting.
Mainly in Killing Floor, 'cause fucking 70,000 Euros is not possible, especially with the Patriarchs.

I'm thinking we go for kf_aperture, since it's relatively easy, and we know our way around.
I think we'd be playing on beginner, since most of us are noobs to KF and haven't leveled many perks yet.

Classes/levels/healers/experience don't matter.
All I want is that goddamned potato.
